Package org.sat4j.maxsat

Class MaxHSLikeSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sat4j.tools.SolverDecorator<org.sat4j.specs.ISolver>
      • org.sat4j.maxsat.MaxHSLikeSolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, WeightedPartialMaxsat, org.sat4j.specs.IProblem, org.sat4j.specs.ISolver, org.sat4j.specs.RandomAccessModel
    public class MaxHSLikeSolver
extends org.sat4j.tools.SolverDecorator<org.sat4j.specs.ISolver>
implements WeightedPartialMaxsat
    Simple MAXHS like maxsat solver. The unsat core computation is performed by a SAT solver, and the minimal hitting set computation is handled by a PBO solver (unlike the original MAXSAT which relies on a MILP solver like CPLEX).
    Since:
    2.3.6
    Author:
    leberre
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                                      throws org.sat4j.specs.ContradictionException
        Description copied from interface: WeightedPartialMaxsat
        Add a soft clause to the solver. if the weight of the clause is greater of equal to the top weight, the clause will be considered as a hard clause.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        weight - the weight of the clause
        literals - the clause
        Returns:
        the constraint is it is not trivially satisfied.
